title: Steam enforces SMS verification to curb malware-ridden updates
description: Valve has announced implementing additional security measures for developers publishing games on Steam, including SMS-based confirmation codes. This is to deal with a recent outbreak of malicious updates pushing malware from compromised publisher accounts. [...]

title: Women Political Leaders Summit targeted in RomCom malware phishing
description: A new, lightweight variant of the RomCom backdoor was deployed against participants of the Women Political Leaders (WPL) Summit in Brussels, a summit focusing on gender equality and women in politics. [...]
